compatibility.notes: The GPL-3.0 license has a strong copyleft effect, meaning that any derivative work must also be licensed under GPL-3.0. This applies to both static and dynamic linking.

key_requirements: Ensure that all recipients receive the same freedoms you received.
Do not impose additional restrictions on the rights granted by the GPL.
Mark modified versions to distinguish them from the original.
license.name: GPL-3.0
obligations: Distribute the source code or provide access to it when distributing binaries.
Include a copy of the GPL license with any distributed software.
Include copyright notices of the original authors.
State any changes made to the original software.
Distribute modified versions under the same GPL license.
